Despite arguments against excluding Aadhaar, the court highlighted the inclusionary nature of the extensive document list. Petitioners, however, argued that the documents have limited coverage among the population, citing low passport ownership.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/large-documents-voter-friendly-supreme-court-on-exclusion-of-aadhaar-from-bihar-sir-observes-11-docs-better-than-7/articleshow/123275089.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/large-documents-voter-friendly-supreme-court-on-exclusion-of-aadhaar-from-bihar-sir-observes-11-docs-better-than-7/articleshow/123275089.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 13:29:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="60456" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123275302,imgsize-60456.cms"/></item><item><title>IPL: LSG set to part ways with Zaheer Khan; new mentor to hold more responsibilities</title><description><![CDATA[Lucknow Super Giants are set to part ways with mentor Zaheer Khan ahead of IPL 2026. The former India pacer also handled bowling duties during his tenure. Whoever will replace Zaheer will have expanded responsibilities across RPSG Group’s global cricket franchises.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/ipl-lsg-set-to-part-ways-with-zaheer-khan-new-mentor-to-hold-more-responsibilities/articleshow/123276288.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/ipl-lsg-set-to-part-ways-with-zaheer-khan-new-mentor-to-hold-more-responsibilities/articleshow/123276288.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 14:07:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRATYUSH RAJ</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="173044" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123276301,imgsize-173044.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Will look into it’: CJI Gavai on SC stray dogs order</title><description><![CDATA[Chief Justice of India BR Gavai has assured to review a plea challenging the Supreme Court's recent directive to relocate all stray dogs in Delhi-NCR to shelters. The matter was brought to the CJI's attention, highlighting a previous order by another bench against the killing and relocation of community dogs, emphasizing compassion for all living beings.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-look-into-it-cji-gavai-on-stray-dogs-order-supreme-court-had-earlier-barred-relocation-killing/articleshow/123274157.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-look-into-it-cji-gavai-on-stray-dogs-order-supreme-court-had-earlier-barred-relocation-killing/articleshow/123274157.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 12:13:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1702674" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123274148,imgsize-1702674.cms"/></item><item><title>BJP digs up 1980 poll roll with Sonia's name; claims she became Indian in 1983</title><description><![CDATA[BJP has retaliated against Congress's 'vote chori' allegation, asserting that Sonia Gandhi's name appeared on electoral rolls in 1980, before she became an Indian citizen. Amit Malviya highlighted this as a violation of electoral law. Anurag Thakur presented alleged discrepancies in Congress-held constituencies, accusing the party of historical electoral malpractices.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/vote-chori-row-bjp-rebuts-congress-fraud-claim-alleges-discrepancies-in-opposition-held-seats/articleshow/123275319.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/vote-chori-row-bjp-rebuts-congress-fraud-claim-alleges-discrepancies-in-opposition-held-seats/articleshow/123275319.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 13:52:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1126221" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123276280,imgsize-1126221.cms"/></item><item><title>Infiltration bid foiled in Uri: 1 soldier killed in action; operation under way</title><description><![CDATA[An infiltration attempt along the Line of Control in Jammu & Kashmir's Uri sector was foiled by the army, resulting in the death of a soldier during the exchange of fire. Security forces have been on high alert following intelligence inputs suggesting possible infiltration attempts from across the LoC and the international border.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/infiltration-bid-along-loc-forces-foil-border-crossing-attempt-in-uri-operation-under-way/articleshow/123269373.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/infiltration-bid-along-loc-forces-foil-border-crossing-attempt-in-uri-operation-under-way/articleshow/123269373.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 10:38:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="746822" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123272269,imgsize-746822.cms"/></item><item><title>Microsoft has a 'Most-wanted' list and why it may be 'Bad news' for Zuckerberg</title><description><![CDATA[Microsoft is aggressively poaching AI talent from Meta, targeting engineers and researchers working on key projects like Llama models and Reality Labs. Offering matched compensation and fast-tracked offers, this move threatens to weaken Meta's AI ambitions, especially after recent layoffs.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-has-a-most-wanted-list-and-why-it-may-be-bad-news-for-meta-ceo-mark-zuckerberg/articleshow/123276219.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsoft-has-a-most-wanted-list-and-why-it-may-be-bad-news-for-meta-ceo-mark-zuckerberg/articleshow/123276219.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 14:02:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="90964" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123276194,imgsize-90964.cms"/></item><item><title>First since 2021! India’s Nayara ships diesel to China amid EU's Russia oil curbs</title><description><![CDATA[An Indian diesel shipment is heading to China, marking the first delivery since 2021, amidst uncertainty surrounding exports from Russia-affiliated Nayara Energy due to EU sanctions. The vessel, carrying approximately 496,000 barrels of ultra-low sulfur diesel, departed from Nayara's Vadinar facility.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/first-time-since-2021-faced-with-eu-sanctions-on-russia-oil-indias-nayara-energy-ships-diesel-cargo-to-china/articleshow/123273799.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/first-time-since-2021-faced-with-eu-sanctions-on-russia-oil-indias-nayara-energy-ships-diesel-cargo-to-china/articleshow/123273799.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 12:49:10 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="77180" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123274816,imgsize-77180.cms"/></item><item><title>IOA formally approves India's bid to stage the 2030 CWG; Ahmedabad the host city</title><description><![CDATA[The Indian Olympic Association has officially endorsed India's bid to host the 2030 Commonwealth Games, with Ahmedabad proposed as the host city. This decision follows Canada's withdrawal, improving India's chances, and a recent venue inspection by Commonwealth Sport officials. India are aiming for an inclusive Games, featuring traditional sports alongside core events, after the 2026 edition reduced its sports roster.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/others/ioa-formally-approves-indias-bid-to-host-the-2030-commonwealth-games/articleshow/123275449.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/others/ioa-formally-approves-indias-bid-to-host-the-2030-commonwealth-games/articleshow/123275449.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 13:31:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="25385" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123275531,imgsize-25385.cms"/></item><item><title>'Will destroy Jagannath temple': Terror graffiti found on wall near Puri shrine</title><description><![CDATA[Panic has ensued in Puri following the discovery of threatening messages scrawled on a wall near the Jagannath temple, warning of a potential terror attack. The graffiti, found near the Heritage Corridor, referenced Prime Minister Modi and included phone numbers, raising serious security concerns.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhubaneswar/panic-at-puri-jagannath-temple-terror-threat-message-found-on-wall-security-tightened/articleshow/123270893.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhubaneswar/panic-at-puri-jagannath-temple-terror-threat-message-found-on-wall-security-tightened/articleshow/123270893.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 09:16:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DEBABRATA MOHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="97338" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270953,imgsize-97338.cms"/></item><item><title>US ‘National Security’ clause: Why it may not increase price of Made-in-India iPhone 17</title><description><![CDATA[Despite the recent 50% tariff imposed on Indian goods by the US, Apple iPhones are currently exempt under the national security clause of Section 232 of the US Trade Expansion Act. This shields India-manufactured iPhones from price hikes in the US market.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/what-is-americas-national-security-clause-that-may-mean-no-increase-in-price-of-made-in-india-iphone-17-models-in-the-us/articleshow/123274915.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/what-is-americas-national-security-clause-that-may-mean-no-increase-in-price-of-made-in-india-iphone-17-models-in-the-us/articleshow/123274915.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 12:55:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="40530" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123274917,imgsize-40530.cms"/></item><item><title>Uber salary: From entry-level roles to top mgt- breakdown based on H-1B data</title><description><![CDATA[Uber is transforming into a super app, expanding beyond ride-hailing. This requires skilled corporate employees. Uber is hiring more international talent through H-1B visas. Data reveals salary ranges for engineers, data scientists, and managers. Staff Software Engineers earn $225,200 to $266,400 per year. Senior Managers earn $230,800 to $299,700. Total compensation includes equity and bonuses.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/auto/news/uber-salary-packages-revealed-from-entry-level-roles-to-top-management-heres-the-real-pay-breakdown-based-on-h-1b-visa-data/articleshow/123250514.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/auto/news/uber-salary-packages-revealed-from-entry-level-roles-to-top-management-heres-the-real-pay-breakdown-based-on-h-1b-visa-data/articleshow/123250514.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 10:52:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TIMESOFINDIA.COM</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="6584" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123272365,imgsize-6584.cms"/></item><item><title>SC cancels bail granted to wrestler Sushil Kumar in murder case</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court overturned the Delhi High Court's decision, revoking Olympic medallist Sushil Kumar's bail in the 2021 murder case of Sagar Dhankar. Kumar is accused of attacking Dhankar over a property dispute, leading to his death from cerebral damage. The court directed Kumar to surrender within a week, acting on allegations of witness intimidation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/wrestling/supreme-court-cancels-bail-granted-to-wrestler-sushil-kumar-in-chhatrasal-stadium-murder-case/articleshow/123273547.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/wrestling/supreme-court-cancels-bail-granted-to-wrestler-sushil-kumar-in-chhatrasal-stadium-murder-case/articleshow/123273547.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 12:01:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="72226" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123273699,imgsize-72226.cms"/></item><item><title>After celebrating Rakhi, UP man rapes minor cousin, kills her; hangs body</title><description><![CDATA[In Auraiya, a shocking crime unfolded as 33-year-old Surjeet sexually assaulted and murdered his 14-year-old cousin shortly after she tied a rakhi on his wrist. Police investigations revealed that Surjeet, after heavy drinking, assaulted the sleeping teenager and attempted to stage her death as a suicide. The suspect has been arrested, and forensic evidence is being gathered to ensure justice.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kanpur/after-celebrating-rakshabandhan-up-man-rapes-minor-cousin-kills-her-hangs-body-to-stage-suicide/articleshow/123272539.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kanpur/after-celebrating-rakshabandhan-up-man-rapes-minor-cousin-kills-her-hangs-body-to-stage-suicide/articleshow/123272539.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 11:52:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>FAIZ RAHMAN SIDDIQUI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="24662" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123273689,imgsize-24662.cms"/></item><item><title>OpenAI may have just fired a 'warning shot' at Indian IT companies' revenue model</title><description><![CDATA[OpenAI's GPT-5 launch poses a threat to India's IT sector, potentially causing a 2-3% revenue decline due to enhanced AI coding capabilities. While AI improves productivity and shifts billing models, firms face challenges adapting to outcome-based pricing. Experts predict short-term pain but long-term gains as new AI opportunities emerge, requiring IT firms to overhaul delivery models.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-may-have-just-fired-a-warning-shot-at-indian-it-companies-revenue-model-says-analyst-note-but-theres-also-/articleshow/123256526.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-may-have-just-fired-a-warning-shot-at-indian-it-companies-revenue-model-says-analyst-note-but-theres-also-/articleshow/123256526.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 15:47:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="480076" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123256517,imgsize-480076.cms"/></item><item><title>National animal status for cow? What Centre told Parliament</title><description><![CDATA[The central government clarified in Parliament that it has no intentions of enacting legislation to declare the cow as the national animal, citing that animal preservation falls under the exclusive legislative powers of state legislatures according to the Constitution. However, the Centre is actively promoting cow protection and rearing through the Rashtriya Gokul Mission, initiated in 2014.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/national-animal-status-for-cow-centre-gives-details-in-parliament-heres-what-it-said/articleshow/123272493.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/national-animal-status-for-cow-centre-gives-details-in-parliament-heres-what-it-said/articleshow/123272493.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 11:27:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1168985" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123272501,imgsize-1168985.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Not right’, says Ajit Pawar as more Maharashtra cities ban meat on Independence Day</title><description><![CDATA[A meat ban on Independence Day in Kalyan-Dombivli sparks protests. Deputy CM Ajit Pawar disagrees with the ban. Other cities like Nagpur and Malegaon also impose similar bans. The order aligns with a state directive. Opposition leaders and citizens criticize the ban. Aditya Thackeray demands suspension of the KDMC commissioner. Protests are planned if the order is not withdrawn.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/not-right-says-deputy-chief-minister-ajit-pawar-as-more-cities-join-independence-day-meat-ban-in-maharashtra/articleshow/123263036.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/not-right-says-deputy-chief-minister-ajit-pawar-as-more-cities-join-independence-day-meat-ban-in-maharashtra/articleshow/123263036.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 22:36:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRADEEP GUPTA AND CHAITANYA MARPAKWAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1031893" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123272450,imgsize-1031893.cms"/></item><item><title>Worry at animal welfare centres: Where do they go after recovery?</title><description><![CDATA[A Supreme Court order mandating the removal of stray dogs to shelters has sparked panic among animal welfare organizations and caregivers in Delhi-NCR. Overcrowding and lack of resources at existing care facilities raise concerns about the well-being of the animals.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/worry-at-animal-welfare-centres-where-do-they-go-after-recovery/articleshow/123265205.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/worry-at-animal-welfare-centres-where-do-they-go-after-recovery/articleshow/123265205.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 05:00:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AMBIKA PANDIT</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1716570" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123272406,imgsize-1716570.cms"/></item><item><title>'Babar should never have been compared to Kohli' – Former Pakistan cricketer</title><description><![CDATA[Ahmed Shehzad has criticized the comparisons between Babar Azam and Virat Kohli, stating they create undue pressure affecting Babar's performance. Shehzad emphasized Kohli's legendary status, unmatched even by MS Dhoni as a batter and athlete. Babar has now gone 72 consecutive international innings without scoring a century, with his last hundred coming against Nepal.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wi-vs-pak-babar-azam-should-never-have-been-compared-to-virat-kohli-former-pakistan-cricketer/articleshow/123270734.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/wi-vs-pak-babar-azam-should-never-have-been-compared-to-virat-kohli-former-pakistan-cricketer/articleshow/123270734.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 09:11:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1288384" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270848,imgsize-1288384.cms"/></item><item><title>70-year-old Sikh man in coma after being attacked with golf club in North Hollywood</title><description><![CDATA[In North Hollywood, a 70-year-old Sikh man, Harpal Singh, was brutally attacked with a golf club while walking to a gurdwara. The assault, which occurred on August 4th, left Singh in critical condition. A disturbing video of how he was left in blood surfaced, which also showed the possible suspect along with a bicycle. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/he-was-almost-dead-70-year-old-sikh-man-harpal-singh-attacked-with-golf-club-in-north-hollywood-remains-in-induced-coma/articleshow/123258727.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/he-was-almost-dead-70-year-old-sikh-man-harpal-singh-attacked-with-golf-club-in-north-hollywood-remains-in-induced-coma/articleshow/123258727.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 17:43:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="27664" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123258721,imgsize-27664.cms"/></item><item><title>Opposition's '124 Not Out' poster girl is 35, blames EC for fault</title><description><![CDATA[Minta Devi, the center of an Indian political controversy due to her voter ID erroneously listing her as 124 years old, has come forward to clarify that she is actually 35. She attributed the error to a clerical mistake, with her birth year incorrectly recorded as 1900 instead of 1990.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/oppositions-124-not-out-poster-girl-is-35-blames-ec-for-fault/articleshow/123268003.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/oppositions-124-not-out-poster-girl-is-35-blames-ec-for-fault/articleshow/123268003.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 05:10:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>MANOJ CHAURASIA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1698727" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123272102,imgsize-1698727.cms"/></item><item><title>Wilson's wife Ciara first descendant of enslaved Africans to get Benin citizenship under new law</title><description><![CDATA[Ciara, the Grammy-winning singer, has made history by becoming one of the first to receive Beninese citizenship through a program aimed at reconnecting descendants of enslaved Africans. This initiative seeks to heal historical wounds and strengthen ties with the Black diaspora. Benin's efforts carry significant weight due to its role in the transatlantic slave trade.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/russell-wilsons-wife-ciara-becomes-first-descendants-of-enslaved-africans-to-receive-benin-citizenship-under-historic-new-law/articleshow/123229875.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/russell-wilsons-wife-ciara-becomes-first-descendants-of-enslaved-africans-to-receive-benin-citizenship-under-historic-new-law/articleshow/123229875.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 16:24:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44252" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123230623,imgsize-44252.cms"/></item><item><title>'Enemy can’t ... ': Pak PM Sharif joins Munir in sabre-rattling over Indus treaty</title><description><![CDATA[Pakistani Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif has cautioned India against disrupting water supplies under the Indus Waters Treaty, threatening a strong response. This follows India's suspension of the treaty after a terrorist attack, with accusations of Pakistan's involvement in cross-border terrorism.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/enemy-cant-snatch-even-a-single-drop-pakistan-pm-shehbaz-joins-munir-in-sabre-rattling-over-indus-treaty-issues-new-threat/articleshow/123271187.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/enemy-cant-snatch-even-a-single-drop-pakistan-pm-shehbaz-joins-munir-in-sabre-rattling-over-indus-treaty-issues-new-threat/articleshow/123271187.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 10:36:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="374036" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123272149,imgsize-374036.cms"/></item><item><title>Two 9-year-old girls gang-raped near private swimming pool in Delhi</title><description><![CDATA[In outer Delhi's Narela, two nine-year-old girls were allegedly gang-raped near an under-construction swimming pool. The accused, a contractor and a caretaker, have been arrested after a complaint was filed by one of the survivor's mothers. Avoiding distractions while eating, getting sunlight, and monitoring stool can also promote better digestion and overall wellness. These simple changes can lead to a healthier gut microbiome.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/harvard-trained-gastroenterologist-shares-10-easy-morning-habits-for-better-gut-health-smoother-digestion-and-lasting-energy/articleshow/123252696.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/harvard-trained-gastroenterologist-shares-10-easy-morning-habits-for-better-gut-health-smoother-digestion-and-lasting-energy/articleshow/123252696.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 15:30:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="58220" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123253151,imgsize-58220.cms"/></item><item><title>Grok blames Musk for 'censoring': AI chatbot stirs row over 'genocide' remark</title><description><![CDATA[Grok, the AI chatbot owned by Elon Musk, was briefly suspended on X after accusing Israel and the United States of "genocide" in Gaza. The investigation is ongoing.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/aadhaar-pan-voter-id-alone-not-enough-proof-of-citizenship-bombay-high-court/articleshow/123267141.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/aadhaar-pan-voter-id-alone-not-enough-proof-of-citizenship-bombay-high-court/articleshow/123267141.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 03:52:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ROSY SEQUEIRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="92006" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123267161,imgsize-92006.cms"/></item><item><title/><description><![CDATA[A video went viral on social media. Police are investigating further.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/uttar-pradesh-horror-deaf-mute-woman-gangraped-in-balrampur-2-arrested-after-early-morning-encounter/articleshow/123270163.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/lucknow/uttar-pradesh-horror-deaf-mute-woman-gangraped-in-balrampur-2-arrested-after-early-morning-encounter/articleshow/123270163.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 08:20:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PATHIKRIT CHAKRABORTY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1530244" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123270186,imgsize-1530244.cms"/></item><item><title>Rajasthan road tragedy: 11 dead in Dausa crash; nine injured hospitalised</title><description><![CDATA[A tragic road accident on the Dausa–Manoharpur Highway claimed the lives of 11 individuals, including women and children, early Wednesday. The victims were returning from Khatu Shyam temple when their pick-up van collided with a container truck. Several others sustained injuries, with some being transferred to SMS Hospital in Jaipur for advanced medical care.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/rajasthan-accident-10-dead-several-injured-in-pick-up-vehicletrailer-truck-crash/articleshow/123269709.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/rajasthan-accident-10-dead-several-injured-in-pick-up-vehicletrailer-truck-crash/articleshow/123269709.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 07:30:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="24936" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123269850,imgsize-24936.cms"/></item><item><title>Asia Cup: 'Indian jawaan ghar wapas nahi aate, aur hum cricket khelne Pak jaate hain'</title><description><![CDATA[Harbhajan Singh has strongly advocated for India to boycott Pakistan matches in the upcoming Asia Cup, echoing the sentiment of 'nation first.' He highlights the sacrifices of soldiers on the border and questions the importance given to Pakistan by the media. Harbhajan was part of the India Champions team that refused to play Pakistan in the WCL.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/india-vs-pakistan-in-asia-cup-humare-jawaan-ghar-wapas-nahi-aate-aur-hum-cricket-khelne-chale-jaate-hain/articleshow/123268855.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/india-vs-pakistan-in-asia-cup-humare-jawaan-ghar-wapas-nahi-aate-aur-hum-cricket-khelne-chale-jaate-hain/articleshow/123268855.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 06:21:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AMIT KUMAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1338732" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123268914,imgsize-1338732.cms"/></item><item><title>Constitutional Club election: Rajiv Pratap Rudy wins tight BJP vs BJP contest</title><description><![CDATA[Rajiv Pratap Rudy secured another term as head of the Constitution Club, defeating Sanjeev Balyan in a high-profile election that saw significant participation from across the political spectrum, including Amit Shah and Sonia Gandhi. Rudy, celebrating his victory, emphasized the collective effort behind his win and the endorsement from parliamentarians.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/constitutional-club-election-rajiv-pratap-rudy-wins-tight-bjp-vs-bjp-contest-heavyweights-like-amit-shah-sonia-gandhi-vote/articleshow/123269799.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/constitutional-club-election-rajiv-pratap-rudy-wins-tight-bjp-vs-bjp-contest-heavyweights-like-amit-shah-sonia-gandhi-vote/articleshow/123269799.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 07:38:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="939565" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123269804,imgsize-939565.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Dashverse to invest $13 million Series A funding in AI R&D to build India’s leading creator ecosystem]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/dashverse-series-a-funding-ai-powered-tools-dashreels-creator-ecosystem-india-19652864.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Dashverse, an AI-driven entertainment startup, is set to invest 60-70% of its recent $13 million Series A funding into advanced AI research and development. With its microdrama app Dashreels surpassing 5 million downloads in just a month and ranking third on the Google Play Store, the company aims to build India’s leading AI creator ecosystem. CEO Sanidhya Narain highlighted the goal of delivering seamless storytelling through AI, tackling challenges like character consistency. Beyond consumer apps, Dashverse also offers AI-powered tools to help creators produce serialised content, aiming to democratise content creation via a thriving two-sided marketplace.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[The GenAI ecosystem in India now comprises over 890 startups, growing 3.7 times in the past year. But, India lags significantly behind global peers in terms of funding. Early-stage funding remains the primary source of capital, as late-stage investments continue to shrink, Nasscom said.]]></description>
